Technical Translation Services for Atlantic Canada
================================================
### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number (Numéro de sollicitation)**: AR22SOA-79141
*   **Solicitation Title (Titre de la sollicitation)**: Technical Translation Services for Atlantic Canada
*   **Closing Date (Date de clôture)**: 2023-01-17T13:00:00
*   **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: 2022-12-09

### Notice Type and Category

*   **Notice Type (Type d'avis)**: Request for Proposal (Demande de proposition)
*   **Procurement Category (Catégorie de l'approvisionnement)**: SRV (Services)

### Description of the Requirement

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites proposals to establish a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for linguistic translation services in Atlantic Canada. The contract is expected to last one year, with a maximum estimated value of $330,000.

Services required:

*   Linguistic translation services for technical documents in various languages
*   Documents to be translated will primarily be related to Department of National Defence (DND) projects

### Eligibility

*   Eligible proponents must be registered vendors with the Canadian government
*   Proponents must have experience in providing translation services to the Department of National Defence

### Evaluation Criteria

*   Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
    *   Technical clarity and accuracy of the proposal
    *   Capability to meet the requirements specified in the RFP
    *   Past experience in providing similar services to the Department of National Defence

### Contract Award

*   The contract award will be announced on the DCC website
*   Proponents can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at [Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada](https://dcc-cdc.gc.ca/)

### Contact Information

*   Mark Smith, Senior Contracting Officer, Defence Construction Canada
*   mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
*   613-859-0549
